column4: sometimes it is the users that are just trying it out that give the best feedback as to how to make it easier for them to switch.  i think everybody wants to make it easier to switch OSes, so listening to the newbies (provided the advice isn't like "make foo faster") is a good idea.  at least thats my opinion...
